alert.note: Alert for Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet; Upper Gila River Valley; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 11 at 3:49AM MDT until October 11 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility below a quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of the Sacramento mountains, especially western slopes. Portions of the lower elevations and valleys of the Gila Region, especially Gila Hot Springs. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility may change quickly.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet; Upper Gila River Valley; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet
